name: Microsoft Windows DWM Core Library权限提升漏洞（CNVD-2025-07782）
product: ["Microsoft Windows Server 2019", "Microsoft Windows 10 1809", "Microsoft Windows Server 2022", "Microsoft Windows 10 21H2", "Microsoft Windows 11 22H2", "Microsoft Windows 10 22H2", "Microsoft Windows 11 23H2", "Microsoft Windows 11 22H3", "Microsoft Windows Server 2025", "Microsoft Windows 11 24h2"]
description: Microsoft Windows DWM Core Library是Windows操作系统中的一个核心库。Microsoft Windows DWM Core Library存在权限提升漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞提升权限。
solution:
目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载：
https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2025-24058
patch: Microsoft Windows DWM Core Library权限提升漏洞（CNVD-2025-07782）的补丁
